content.text: 3 bone-in chicken breast halves, skinless
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 bone-in chicken breast halves, skinless" )

content.text: 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth" )

content.text: 3 potatoes
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "3 potatoes" )

content.text: 1 yellow onion
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 yellow onion" )

content.text: 3 stalks celery
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "3 stalks celery" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "2 tablespoons vegetable oil" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "2 tablespoons all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "2 cups frozen mixed vegetables" )

content.text: 1 to taste salt and pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 to taste salt and pepper to taste" )

content.text: 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1/4 teaspoon garlic powder" )

content.text: 1 (9 inch) frozen prepared pie crust, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1 (9 inch) frozen prepared pie crust, thawed" )

content.text: 0) Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken.
1) Add some salt and pepper and garlic powder.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "some salt"@7:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "pepper"@21:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "garlic powder"@32:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Let cool in the pot.
3) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-3-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-3-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender.
5) Drain and set aside.
6) Wash celery and cut to bite-size pieces.
7) Cut onion to bite-size pieces.
8) In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "saute"@47:52 / AC
		:ppt ( "celery"@53:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "onion"@64:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "2 tablespoons oil"@75:92 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "5 to 8 minutes"@98:112 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "a large heavy skillet"@6:27 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium heat"@34:45 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Add the frozen vegetables and cook another 5 minutes.
10) Add flour and cook about 30 seconds.
11) Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
12) After it has become thick, add potatoes.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "add"@31:34 / AC
		:duration ( cond-12-0 "After it has become thick"@4:29 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( "potatoes"@35:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-13 / R
	:inform ( ac-13-0 "Remove"@4:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-13-0 "pot"@24:27 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-13-1 "cut"@32:35 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:todo ( "bite-size pieces"@41:57 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-13-2 "add"@62:65 / AC
		:ppt ( "vegetable mixture"@69:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 14) Add salt and pepper to taste.
content.eamr:
( inst-14 / R
	:inform ( ac-14-0 "Add"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@8:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "pepper"@17:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-14-0 "to taste"@24:32 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 15) Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell.
16) Make sure you crimp the edges of the pie shell to the plate so no juices spill in oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-16 / R
	:inform ( ac-16-0 "crimp"@18:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the edges of the pie shell"@24:50 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-16-0 "the plate"@54:63 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-16-0 "so no juices spill in oven"@64:90 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 17) Bake at 350  degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until pie shell is cooked and golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-17 / R
	:inform ( ac-17-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-17-0 "350  degrees F"@12:26 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-17-1 "175 degrees C"@28:41 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-17-0 "45 minutes"@47:57 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-17-0 "until pie shell is cooked and golden brown"@61:103 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
